mapper.select: select o.code, o.date, o.material, m.group_id, c.group_name, m.code_id, c.code_name, o.amount, m.name, o.reg_date, o.reg_emp, e1.name as reg_name, o.update_date, o.update_emp, e2.name as update_name, o.status from ORDERS o left outer join MAPD m ON o.material = m.code left outer join COMMON_CODE c ON c.group_id = m.group_id AND c.code_id = m.code_id left outer join EMPLOYEES e1 ON e1.code = o.reg_emp left outer join EMPLOYEES e2 ON e2.code = o.update_emp where o.code like '%FO%' and o.status = '신청' ORDER BY ${search.eng[search.activeSortCategory]} ${search.sortValue} LIMIT ${cri.startPage}, ${cri.pageSize}
